findings.title: Tokenstaking.sol Ambiguity
findings.description: Tokenstaking.sol does not clearly specify whether it holds reward and stake balance together or separately.

findings.title: RandomEggMinter.sol uses chainlink VRF to generate random numbers
findings.description: RandomEggMinter.sol contract uses Chainlink VRF for generating random numbers which may incur fees.

findings.title: Low 1. Missing Checks
findings.description: In KMCv1.sol contract, unthrottleAccount function needs to check if the account is already unthrottled and whitelistAccount() function needs to check if the account is already whitelisted.

findings.title: Low 2. Missing Whitelist Control
findings.description: In WhitelistCounterUpgradeable.sol contract, the function isWhitelistedAmt() needs to check if the address is whitelisted first before whitelisting the amount.
